title: Online Microlearning Course for Enhancing Healthcare Professionals' Educational Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic medical training or relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-centric education in a BYOD environment, combining real-time video lectures with asynchronous learning materials.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more effective teaching methods applicable in medical education settings
Learners can design a 5-minute microlearning module for mobile environments and receive peer feedback
Learners can establish and execute peer-to-peer (P2P) learning support strategies using social media such as WhatsApp
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
